pullrequest.title: Fixes for non real errors in saucy cppcheck

content.raw:
It looks like you disabled some of the cppcheck commands when not using Jenkins. Also, by adding those files to the suppression file, it disables all cppcheck analysis of those files, when I think we only wanted to disable unused function testing.

I've put some code in branch fixes_for_cppcheck_scpeters (5063012 and 459f3c5) that will use a separate suppression file for unused function checking, and also adds Console.cc and parser.cc to the suppression list.
content.html:
It looks like you disabled some of the cppcheck commands when not using Jenkins. Also, by adding those files to the suppression file, it disables all cppcheck analysis of those files, when I think we only wanted to disable unused function testing.

I've put some code in branch fixes_for_cppcheck_scpeters (5063012 and 459f3c5) that will use a separate suppression file for unused function checking, and also adds Console.cc and parser.cc to the suppression list.
